data.text: Amafarisayo akina ni owiittuchiha Malhehero yahonttwara Yesu ukhuma Uyerusalemu uwa unkohani,
“Nlhatu waani owiittucha inyu khantuna meettuchiho nipochenre ihu wa ashulhupalhe? Khanonyawa mathatha rata thoko chinolheheriya aya ahinaya ulhia yolhia!”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Wo nlhatu waani mwaatti khannottwara malheheriyo a Nlhuku, nansho nttwaraka meettuchiho inyu mwaashinene?
Nlhuku heera wiira, ‘Mwaathimicheke athumwaninyu ni anumwaninyu, ni ntu riyoothe naaruwana athumwanawe ama anumwanawe, yoyo nambaya eeviye.’
Nansho mwaattiva nnettuchiha wiira ntu akhalhanaka ittu yo waavaha athumwanawe ama anumwanawe, nansho eeraka, ‘Ilha ittu ilha kihommaha isadaka Nlhuku,’
paahi, ahaalhohe tho athumwanawe! Chiichammo etu phi hinolhoha inyu malheheriyo a Nlhuku, nlhatu no uttwara meettuchiho inyu mwaanene.
Mwaattiva va, anafiki! Ashinna Isaya aholhohera rata o waachakani mwaatti!
‘Nlhuku neera, Alha attu alha anokithimicha wo malhoveru, nansho munrimani mwaya arii utayi ni mii.
Ukithimicha waya khunolhoka,
Yesu nkeehana nlhoko wa attu, nkeerelha, “Mwiiweke ni uchuwelha!
Ittu inonhelha ntu nsheru kihiwe inokelha vamalhakuni, nansho chilhe chinokhuma mmwano phi chechiyo chinonnanariha ntu,”
Yamalheke owiittucha nkayaawa, nkayeera, “Chani, nhochuwelha wiira Amafarisayo ahorushiya veewilhe aya malhove inyu?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kila ntepo uhaalhiye ni Athithi o wiirimu unoophelhiya.”
“Nhoove yayo manyaattu ayo! Yayo phi aholhelhi o hoona, aaholhelhaka o hoona akhunanaya, onkhaye elhi ayo anootumbuchira munlhikitini.”
Napeturo nkayeera, “Nkanilhamulhelheni nenno nlhikaaniho nno.”
Yesu nkeera, “Ata mwaattiva khannochuwelha mpaka nna?
Chani, khanchuwenlhe wiira ittu inokelha mmwano inokelha munthunkwani, kaanyuma khukumihiyaka urindini?
Nansho chittu chinokhumelha uwano chinokhuma munrimani, ni chiyo phi nonnanariha ntu.
Ukhalhawaya munrimani mwa ntu phi nokhuma malhove o uhilhoka, o wiiva, o ulhuva, o ulhavalhava, o wiiya, o woothacha ni o uruwana.
Yayo phi no nnanariha ntu. Nansho ulhia yolhia wo uhinyawa mathatha thoko chineera inyu khunonnanariha ntu.”
Yesu nkaathama vavawo vakitu vawo nkaarwa uukhalhani ilhapo yaatamana ni iwani cho Utiro ni Usidoni.
Opani amoka Akananayo aakhalha yeyo ilhapo iyo ahonrweelha Yesu nkayaakhuwelha eeraka, “Mwaana a Adaudi, ukoonelhe ikiriri Thithi! Mwaamwanaka, mwalhi noohuvihiya ni mashoka o unanara.”
Nansho Yesu khaakhunlhe nlhove. Paahi owiittucha awe yahonrwelha, nkayaamwirelha, “Mwaahiyeke arwee! Khannoona wiira anonittwarattwara ni uninyakulha!”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kirumiye wa attu o inupa yo Israeli vekha aya, apotenre thoko ikhondoro chihiri ni nshunga.”
Opani ayo nkayaawa, nkayaakhoroma, nkayeera, “Thithi nkoonelhe ikiriri!”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Khavanorera waathurulha ashaana yolhia aya ni waawonyera ashipwa.”
Opani ayo nkaayakhulha, “Eiyo Thithi, nansho ata ashipwa ayo anoorokottacha cholhia chinomoramora vamezani va apwiiya aya.”
Vavawo Yesu nkaakhulha, “Maanyi nrima inyu mulhupalhe! Paahi etu, mpangelhiyeke thoko chinothanana inyu.” Yeyo isaa, mwalhi aya uyo nkaalhama.
Yesu nkaathama vavawo nkaarwa uchereshere ibahari yo Ugalilaya. Nkaawelha mmwaakoni, nkaakhalha.
Attu enchi nkayammweelha, yaawihaka attu o heeta ni o uhiweha ni o remara ni o uhulhumacha ni attu akina enchi yaari areta, nkayeeshiya vamietoni va Yesu, nkaalhamihacha.
Nlhoko wa attu nkawoomiya uwanoni chinene yooneke attu ohulhumacha yuulhumachaka, oremara alhamaka, oheeta yeetaka ni attu o hoona yoonaka, attu nkayanthimicha Nlhuku o Uisraeli.
Yesu nkeehana owiittucha awe, nkeera, “Kinowoonelha ikiriri alha attu alha wo nlhatu no ukhalha ni mii wo mahuku mararu wo uhilhia. Ni mii khakinooria waahiya wo uhilhia, anookomwaacha mphironi.”
Owiittucha awe nkayankoha, “Ninohalha upatta vayi yolhia yo uwanelha attu enchi thoko alha?”
Yesu nkaakoha, “Nrina mikatte nchani?”
Paahi, Yesu nkaalhehera wiira attu akhalhihiye vathi.
Nkaawiaa mikatte chilhe ni achihopa alhe, nkanthimicha Nlhuku, nkaamianihacha, nkaavaha owiittucha, ni ayo nkayaakawelha attu.
Attu onkhaye nkayaalhia, nkayaawonacha. Yamalheke owiittucha nkayaakusha mahalha aahanlhe, nkayaachariha makaya saba.
Attu yaalhilhie yaari manyaalhopwana maelufu ncheshe, wo uhaalhakelha manyopani ni ashaana.
Paahi Yesu nkaalheha attu, nkaathama nkaawelha nkalhavani, nkaarwa ilhapo yo Umagadani.
